website_summaries.verdict: Pick this style if you have your heart set on Hunter rain boots but require a fit with a less roomy interior.
pros: Offers the brand's tall design with a glossy finish in a sleek cut with less curvature of the toe
A good choice for tall, thin ladies and those who have narrow calves and feet
cons: A common concern about this style is the tendency for the boots to fit too tightly around the calf and rub at the bend of the knee

customer_reviews.title: nice boots, fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: i’m 5’4”, 118lbs, small calves and not wide feet, so this refined style fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Rain boot cracked after a few weeks of use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of Hunter Women's boots in a size 6 in January from Zappos. To my dismay the right boot has already cracked in a few places (pls see picture attached) although I just started wearing them a few weeks ago. This is surprising since I normally think as Hunter as a quality brand and have purchased similar rain boots in the past which lasted for years. Unfortunately Amazon will not replace the boots since it's past Amazon's 30 day return policy. Sadly Zappos stands behind Amazon's return policy and won't replace them either. They offered me a 25% refund but would have much rather have gotten a new pair...
customer_reviews.author: Sandrine Beckner

customer_reviews.title: Fakes? Distressed? Powdery?
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come in a Hunter box--made me suspicious. Had a white powder all over that I washed if but the residue made them look old, like a chemical treatment. Looks like they're distressed (in a bad way) but I expected them to be clean and glossy. Returning. Can't help but think they're fakes, but it's fulfilled by Zappos, so thoroughly confused.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: They fit fine until you take them off
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the color and the look! They are slim and you will only be able to wear leggings with them, which I knew before buying them and was ok with. BUT the suction in these are unreal! After wearing these it becomes so hard to pull off, I have to sit on the floor and pull as hard as I can to get them off. Do not take these off infront of other people, you will look like a fool and risk becoming a meme.
customer_reviews.author: Amber wilt

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like the RED LABEL -- buy product from Nordstrom
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize until later that the Red Hunter label shows on this one and not the exact product sold on the Nordstrom website. That one has the label blacked out so the red label doesn't stick out like a sore thumb. I often wear my boots walking into work with dresses and even had to wear my old black rain boots that gave out at a funeral site, so you just never know where you'll need them and for what occasion. For the money, I'd rather not have that big, red label. Not attractive in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Flattering -
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on these boots. They are high quality & look so flattering. Fashionable & utilitarian. Much taller than most rain boots, which I love, though I am 5’ so they come up into my knee crease when I sit. They are also more narrow in the foot than most rain boots, not enough room for a thicker pair of socks, but I love that they aren’t clunky & heavy footed. Perfect if you have a more tall & slender body type.
customer_reviews.author: Rain Bo

customer_reviews.title: Too tall for short ladies
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these boots and they are great quality however I’m 5’ 3” and they are just too high cuts right into my knees and couldn’t sit down in them or do stairs! Something for Hunter to consider with their high boots.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! The fit on these boots is a little more snug than the original matte boots. I wear an 8-1/2 and the size 9 fit me perfectly. Not much room left for thick socks though. They're not quite as comfortable as the matte boots, they're a little heavier and don't bend as easily. But if you want the gloss style, they're still great boots!
customer_reviews.author: TraceyB

customer_reviews.title: Narrow boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability of the boots. Boots are very narrow. Not as tall as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: nicole glenn

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Like
customer_reviews.text: No at all comfortable seemed like outside ankle should have been inside
customer_reviews.author: PattyNH

customer_reviews.title: Nice but to tight on the legs
customer_reviews.text: Boot size was good but fit is tight on legs. Could wear with leggings but not jeans or slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Ulysses

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The front "tag" isn't red & white as pictured, and they run big. Need to return due to size issue, but not comfortable reordering since what was advertised isn't what was received. In addition, the box arrived damaged and taped back together. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Louw

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and fit. Much more feminine that the original fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs so small esp at the top
customer_reviews.text: I truly got this stuck on my foot. It runs so much smaller overall than regular hunter boots.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Super quality boot!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has very athletic calves and the fit was super tight, had to order the shorter ones. These boots are great quality and not some china knock off, made in England.
customer_reviews.author: David Seller

customer_reviews.title: Boots fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was worried after reading other reviews that the boots might not fit true to size. I wear a size 7 shoe and purchased a size 7 boot. They fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: These are not authentic Hunter boots, but made in China knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miss representation.
customer_reviews.text: The boots were misrepresented from the picture. The picture clearly showed the black gloss hunter boot and I received the mat color. I have no time to return the item so I will live with it because it will still serve the same purpose but this was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mieke Frishman

customer_reviews.title: Color is not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to be more blue but in fact they are purple. Not sure if I plan to keep them
customer_reviews.author: Cooperc2

customer_reviews.title: best boots ever.....
customer_reviews.text: My feet remain dry, cozy and comfortable whenever I wear my Hunter boots. Only regret ..it took so long to purchase them!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: My go to boots
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome boots. Just ordered another color. Can wear with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry C Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I find the boots a bit uncomfortable personally. Wish they would hold their shape better.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly DiNicolo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love? Perfect fit (but I always buy a half size bigger with rain boots).
customer_reviews.author: K V

customer_reviews.title: Sizing: run large
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous boots that fit well for a narrow calf. Too roomy in the toe area, however. But a half size smaller in womens.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I originally loved these boots. After a couple of days the boot started to crease above the ankle. I would not have purchased these boots knowing they wouldn't hold their shape after a week of wear. Will not purchase these boots again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the refined style!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. True to size and the refined style is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Haverstick

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking- great fit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these boots. Like that they are a bit less bulky and more fitted around the ankle and calf than the original Hunter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is off
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 7 and these were waaay to big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived 2 days early!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Wore them to the pumpkin patch last week. Probably will get the cushion inserts though- there is no passing and after a while you start to feel it! Was very pleased with the fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Hunter are the best
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, exact fit for my wife and exactly what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like a Chinese finger trap for your legs
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful boots but soo tight. I do not have particularly large calves or ankles. You need stick legs to wear these comfortably. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I am a 6.5, I ordered a 6 and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: kris16234

customer_reviews.title: Calves are tight.
customer_reviews.text: I loved them & wanted them so bad found them on sale gloss black super adorable but have to return as my normal size calves don’t fit in them. Disappointed to say. For skinny calves only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definite "Keepers"
customer_reviews.text: I love them and they fit perfectly. They had a little more shine then I had anticipated but that was not a deal breaker. These Hunter boots a "Keeper". I'm enjoying wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Evans

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots were a gift, the recipient changed their mind and the item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: toonie

product_meta.title: Hunters Boots Women's Original Refined Gloss Boots
product_meta.description: The original bestselling version of the label's famous wellies. These Hunter rain boots are crafted in glossy rubber and features a cushioned footbed and nylon lining for superior comfort.
feature_bullets: Note: Select your US size. Please be advised, the product and box will display UK, US and Euro sizing. For US sizing, both men's and women's sizing is displayed. Men's sizing is represented by "M" and women's sizing is represented by "F".
With as much versatility as the Hunter™ Original Gloss boots, this new design will cover all your bases.

Pull-on construction. Hunter fit and comfort. Round toe. Textile lining. Cushioned footbed. Flexible rubber sole. The brand advises that a white wax film may appear on the surface of the rubber boots and that it can be wiped off with a damp cloth. This "blooming" effect is not a defect. Blooming is caused when the boots are exposed to extreme temperatures or temperature swings and the wax helps prevent the rubber from weathering. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 1 in Weight: 2 lbs
